subject: We write to enquire if you
body:
We write to enquire if you have instructed one Mr. Alan Garnett of (53 Shenley Fields Road, Selly Oak, Birmingham B29 5AL, United Kingdom.)to receive your funds valued $11.5 Million Dollars on your behalf? Mr. Alan contacted us claiming to be your partner and that you have instructed him to act on your behalf henceforth. He also claimed that you gave him power to receive your funds as your partner.
We have instructed him to check back with us to enable us to get in touch with you before taking any action.
We advise you as a matter of urgency to get back to us immediately on the receipt of this email for confirmation.
We also wish to inform you that your payment has been scheduled to be released to him through bank to bank transfer or our online payment method if we do not hear from you meaning he is right.
Looking forward to your prompt response and cooperation..
Sincerely,
Kori L. Ogrosky

subject: Re:    We write to enquire if you
body:
Hello Kori,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, I am a bit surprised by this email. I have never heard of Mr. Alan Garnett before, and I certainly haven't instructed anyone to receive any funds on my behalf. Could you please provide me with more details about this situation? How did Mr. Alan Garnett claim to be my partner? And what exactly is the purpose of these funds?

I appreciate your urgency in contacting me, and I assure you that I will respond promptly once I have a better understanding of the situation.

Best wishes,
Mary

subject: Re: We write to enquire if you
body:
Dear Beneficiary,

We acknowledge the receipt of your email, Be advised that your funds are
intact and we want to assure you that the impostor will be arrested for an
attempted fraud. In the same hand, we are supposed to have completed this
transaction before the death of Mrs. Anna Nguyen who bequeathed these funds
to you. We have also concluded an arrangement to complete this transaction
within 24 hours and we urge for your cooperation and be advised to maintain
constant communication with us henceforth. We have also had many people
contacting us to have these funds released to them but considering that we
don't have any dealings or instructions from Mrs. Anna to release the funds
to such individuals while she was alive, we have decided to decline their
request. I also wish to acknowledge that your total fund is $11.5 Million
Dollars.

You are to choose between the payment option below and get back to us
immediately with your contact number where you can be reached:

1) Bank to bank transfer.

2) ATM CARD.

Thanking you in anticipation.

Sincerely,
Kori L. Ogrosky
CORPORATE SECRETARY/INTERNET BANKING
Pacific Western Bank.
800.654.7962
800.236.2442
Available 24/7 for general inquiries
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2023 Pacific Western Bank All Rights Reserved.
****DISCLAIMER: If you are NOT the intended recipient and you receive this
message by mistake either electronically or mechanically, kindly delete it
from your list or notify the Pacific Western Bank by Email:
kori.ogrosky@pacificwest.com

subject: Re: We write to enquire if you
body:
Dear Kori L. Ogrosky,

Thank you for your email. I appreciate the update regarding my funds and I'm glad to hear that the impostor will be dealt with accordingly. It's a relief to know that my funds are still intact.

I understand that there were some complications due to the unfortunate passing of Mrs. Anna Nguyen. Could you please provide more details about how we can proceed with completing the process within hours? I want to ensure that everything is done correctly and legally.

Regarding the payment options, could you please explain the difference between bank-to-bank transfer and an ATM card? Which option would be more secure and convenient for me?

Thank you for your assistance in this matter.

Best wishes,
Mary

subject: Re: We write to enquire if you
body:
Dear Beneficiary,

This is to acknowledge the receipt of your email once again.

Be advised that both bank to bank transfer and ATM CARD payment are
secured. We will need you to provide us with your banking details such as
follows to be able to transfer the funds directly to your bank account:

Bank Name:
Address:
Account Name:
Account Number:
Iban:
Swift:
Your Address:

While ATM CARD payment option we need only your address where the ATM Card
will be delivered and contact number where you can be reached.

Provide us with the details of any of the above payment option you prefer
in order to proceed and ensure this transaction is concluded as scheduled.

Thanking you in anticipation.

Sincerely,
Kori L. Ogrosky
CORPORATE SECRETARY/INTERNET BANKING
Pacific Western Bank.
800.654.7962
800.236.2442
Available 24/7 for general inquiries
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2024 Pacific Western Bank All Rights Reserved.
****DISCLAIMER: If you are NOT the intended recipient and you receive this
message by mistake either electronically or mechanically, kindly delete it
from your list or notify the Pacific Western Bank by Email:
kori.ogrosky@pacificwest.com

subject: Re: We write to enquire if you
body:
Dear Kori L. Ogrosky,

Thank you for your email. I appreciate your response and the information you provided about the payment options. I understand that both bank to bank transfer and ATM CARD payment are secure methods.

Regarding the bank to bank transfer, could you please clarify what specific banking details you require? Is it just the account number and routing number?

As for the ATM CARD payment option, I would like to know more about how the card will be delivered. Will it be sent through regular mail or a courier service? Also, is there any cost associated with the delivery?

I look forward to your prompt reply so that we can proceed with the payment as scheduled.

Best wishes,
Mary

subject: Re: We write to enquire if you
body:
We will need you to provide us with your banking details such as follows to
be able to transfer the funds directly to your bank account:

Bank Name:
Address:
Account Name:
Account Number:
Iban:
Swift:
Your Address:

The ATM CARD will be sent to you through Courier company and the delivery
cost will be deducted from the funds.

subject: Re: We write to enquire if you
body:
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your willingness to share information. Could you please provide me with more details about the ATM card and how it works? I'm curious to learn more about the delivery process and any fees involved.

Best wishes,
Mary
